7 from niryo_robot_poses_handlers.file_manager import NiryoRobotFileException

9 import niryo_robot_poses_handlers.pose_manager as pose_manager
10 import niryo_robot_poses_handlers.workspace_manager as workspace_manager
11 
12 test_folder = "~/Tests_Niryo_Ned/"
13 test_folder = os.path.expanduser(test_folder)
14 
15 points = [[0.278, 0.104, 0.058], [0.275, -0.036, 0.058],
16  [0.125, -0.040, 0.059], [0.127, 0.109, 0.059]]
17 robot_poses = [[[0.281, 0.102, 0.083], [2.200, 1.439, 2.367]],
18  [[0.276, -0.03, 0.083], [2.058, 1.473, 1.704]],
19  [[0.123, -0.04, 0.084], [0.132, 1.499, -0.12]],
20  [[0.121, 0.110, 0.083], [-0.19, 1.339, -0.19]]]

23 def create_test_folder():
24  if not os.path.isdir(test_folder):
25  os.makedirs(test_folder)
26 
27 
28 def delete_test_folder():
29  if os.path.isdir(test_folder):
30  shutil.rmtree(test_folder)
31 
32 
33 def check_get_read_remove(obj):
34  obj.assertEqual(obj.manager.get_all_names(), [])
35  obj.assertFalse(obj.manager.exists("NotExist"))
36  with obj.assertRaises(NiryoRobotFileException):
37  obj.manager.read("NoOne")
38  with obj.assertRaises(NiryoRobotFileException):
39  obj.manager.remove("NoOne")

41 
42 class TestPoseMethods(unittest.TestCase):
43 
44  def setUp(self):
45  create_test_folder()
46  self.path = os.path.join(test_folder, "positions")
47  self.manager = pose_manager.PoseManager(position_dir=self.path)
48 
49  def tearDown(self):
50  shutil.rmtree(self.path)
51  delete_test_folder()
52 
53  def test_python_get_read_remove_pos(self):
54  check_get_read_remove(self)
55 
56  def test_python_creation_delete_pos(self):
57  self.assertEqual(self.manager.get_all_names(), [])
58  list_names = []
59  pose = [[0., 1., 2., 3., 4., 5.], [1, 2, 3], [1, 2, 3], [1, 2, 3, 4]]
60  for i in range(5):
61  name = "Test{}".format(i)
62  self.manager.create(name, *pose)
63  self.assertEqual(self.manager.read(name).get_value(), pose)
64 
65  list_names.append(name)
66  self.assertEqual(self.manager.get_all_names(), list_names)
67  for name in list_names:
68  self.manager.remove(name)
69  self.assertEqual(self.manager.get_all_names(), [])
70

72 class TestWorkspaceMethods(unittest.TestCase):
73 
74  def setUp(self):
75  create_test_folder()
76  self.path = os.path.join(test_folder, "workspaces")
77  self.manager = workspace_manager.WorkspaceManager(self.path)
78 
79  def tearDown(self):
80  shutil.rmtree(self.path)
81  delete_test_folder()
82 
83  def test_python_get_read_remove_workspaces(self):
84  check_get_read_remove(self)
85 
86  def test_python_creation_delete_workspace(self):
87  self.assertEqual(self.manager.get_all_names(), [])
88  list_names = []
89  for i in range(3):
90  name = "Test{}".format(i)
91  self.manager.create(name, points, robot_poses=None)
92  self.assertEqual(self.manager.read(name).get_value(), tuple([points, []]))
93  self.manager.remove(name)
94  self.manager.create(name, points, robot_poses)
95  self.assertEqual(self.manager.read(name).get_value(), tuple([points, robot_poses]))
96 
97  list_names.append(name)
98  self.assertEqual(self.manager.get_all_names(), list_names)
99  for name in list_names:
100  self.manager.remove(name)
101  self.assertEqual(self.manager.get_all_names(), [])

105  unittest.main()
